doc.title: XForms

value.content:
XForms is a convention for building Web forms and processing form data in the XML format.

Note: No major browser supports XForms any longer—we suggest using HTML5 forms instead.

doc.summary: XForms is a convention for building Web forms and processing form data in the XML format.
